nodes.text: Savage Opress's lightsaber was a double-bladed lightsaber used by Savage Opress during the Clone Wars. Savage used the lightsaber against foes like Adi Gallia, Katuunko, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Darth Sidious, and many others.

Savage Opress's lightsaber closely resembled his brother Maul's original lightsaber, but also contained design features similar to Count Dooku's lightsaber, including the emitter guards on both ends. Opress's weapon had an ignition frequency similar to a growl, while the hum of the blade had a much deeper resonance. The lightsaber blade was notably longer than the average lightsabers.

Opress first used his lightsaber in sparring practice with his master Dooku on the planet Serenno. In battle, he used his weapon against Dooku and Ventress, as well as Jedi Generals Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi during the Showdown at Toydaria. He again used his weapon against Kenobi alongside his brother Maul on Raydonia and later on Florrum when they attacked the Ohnaka Gang's base, during which he also engaged and murdered Jedi Council member Adi Gallia.He also used his lightsaber to kill several guards and to "fight" Pre Vizsla, during on a plot to overthrown Duchess Satine Kryze, orchestrated by his brother Maul. Savage used it one last time to fight Maul's former master, Darth Sidious, who fatally impaled the hulking Zabrack with his dual lightsabers, causing Opress to drop the weapon.
